item.title: docker
item.description: 1. What is docker and why would you use it? “In simpler words, Docker is a tool that allows developers, sys-admins etc. to easily deploy their applications in a sandbox (called containers) to run on the host operating system i.e. Linux.” Comparing to Python, it’s basically a virtualenv, but for the whole OS. Or this is some sort of a virtual machine; it’s a program, which lets you to encapsulate your software into its own, the most basic “OS” (known as “container” in docker’s world) and run it on any machine/server, which has docker installed;
